types.name: Date
types.description: The `Date` scalar type represents a timestamp provided in UTC. `Date` expects timestamps to be formatted in accordance with the [ISO-8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) standard.

types.name: __Schema
types.description: A GraphQL Schema defines the capabilities of a GraphQL server. It exposes all available types and directives on the server, as well as the entry points for query, mutation, and subscription operations.

fields.name: types
fields.description: A list of all types supported by this server.

fields.name: queryType
fields.description: The type that query operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: mutationType
fields.description: If this server supports mutation, the type that mutation operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: subscriptionType
fields.description: If this server supports subscription, the type that subscription operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: directives
fields.description: A list of all directives supported by this server.

types.name: __Type
types.description:
The fundamental unit of any GraphQL Schema is the type. There are many kinds of types in GraphQL as represented by the `__TypeKind` enum.

Depending on the kind of a type, certain fields describe information about that type. Scalar types provide no information beyond a name and description, while Enum types provide their values. Object and Interface types provide the fields they describe. Abstract types, Union and Interface, provide the Object types possible at runtime. List and NonNull types compose other types.

types.name: __TypeKind
types.description: An enum describing what kind of type a given __Type is.

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a scalar.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an object.  `fields` and `possibletypes` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an interface.  `fields` and `possibleTypes` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a union.  `possibleTypes` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an num.  `enumValues` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an input object.  `inputFields` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: LIST
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a list.  `ofType` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: NON_NULL
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a non-null.  `ofType` is a valid field.

types.name: __Field
types.description: Object and Interface types are described by a list of Fields, each of which has a name, potentially a list of arguments, and a return type.

types.name: __InputValue
types.description: Arguments provided to Fields or Directives and the input fields of an InputObject are represented as Input Values which describe their type and optionally a default value.

fields.name: defaultValue
fields.description: A GraphQL-formatted string representing the default value for this input value.

types.name: __EnumValue
types.description: One possible value for a given Enum. Enum values are unique values, not a placeholder for a string or numeric value. However an Enum value is returned in a JSON response as a string.

types.name: __Directive
types.description:
A Directive provides a way to describe alternate runtime execution and type validation behavior in a GraphQL document.

In some cases, you need to provide options to alter GraphQL's execution behavior in ways field arguments will not suffice, such as conditionally including or skipping a field. Directives provide this by describing additional information to the executor.

types.name: __DirectiveLocation
types.description: A Directive can be adjacent to many parts of the GraphQL language, a __DirectiveLocation describes one such possible adjacencies.

enumValues.name: QUERY
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a query operation.

enumValues.name: MUTATION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a mutation operation.

enumValues.name: SUBSCRIPTION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a subscription operation.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a fragment definition.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_SPREAD
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a fragment spread.

enumValues.name: INLINE_FRAGMENT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an inline fragment.

enumValues.name: SCHEMA
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a schema definition.

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a scalar definition.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an object type definition.

enumValues.name: FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a field definition.

enumValues.name: ARGUMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an argument defintion.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an interface definition.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a union definition.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an enum definition

enumValues.name: ENUM_VALUE
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an enum value definition

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an input object type defintion.

enumValues.name: INPUT_FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an input object field definition.

fields.name: tag
fields.description: The tag of the permission, used for assigning the permission.

fields.name: enables
fields.description: Other permissions that are also assigned when this permission is assigned.

fields.name: level
fields.description: The level value of the rank.

fields.name: permissions
fields.description: Permissions given to all members who hold this rank.

types.name: Faction
types.description: One of the three realms in Camelot Unchained.

enumValues.name: Factionless
enumValues.description: No Faction or All Factions (NPC Only)

types.name: Race
types.description: One of the races in Camelot Unchained.

enumValues.name: Healer
enumValues.description: Some might call this a medic

fields.name: armorStatCalculationType
fields.description: How any armor stats are added in when calculating damage on this layer

types.name: ArmorStatCalculationType
types.description: armor stat calculation types are used when computing how much of an effect a piece of equipped armor has on a per GearSlot basis.

enumValues.name: None
enumValues.description: Does not factor into stats, used for gear slots for weapons

enumValues.name: Average
enumValues.description: Average with all other gearslots of this layer and subpart

enumValues.name: Add
enumValues.description: Just add the results for this part to the subpart pool but don't raise the denominator that is averaging the slots

fields.name: gearLayer
fields.description: Which layer this slot belongs to

fields.name: subpartIDs
fields.description: Which body subparts this slot belongs to

fields.name: gearSlots
fields.description: A list of gear slots which makes up a valid set of places a item can be equipped on at once.

fields.name: tags
fields.description: Tags on this item, these can be referenced by recipes

fields.name: gearSlotSets
fields.description: the sets of gear slots this item can be equipped to

enumValues.name: Basic
enumValues.description: Basic item that does not fit into any other categories

enumValues.name: Ammo
enumValues.description: Ammo for skills and siege engines

enumValues.name: Weapon
enumValues.description: Weapons which can be equipped and used by skills

enumValues.name: Alloy
enumValues.description: An alloy, made from substances, and used in crafting

enumValues.name: Substance
enumValues.description: Substances harvested from resource nodes, used in crafting

enumValues.name: SiegeEngine
enumValues.description: Controllable items used in siege combat

fields.name: item
fields.description: Stats shared by all types of items

fields.name: quality
fields.description: The quality of the item, this will be a value between 0-1

fields.name: selfMass
fields.description: The mass of the item without the mass of anything inside of it

fields.name: totalMass
fields.description: The mass of the item and anything inside of it

fields.name: encumbrance
fields.description: The encumbrance of an item is used while the item is equipped to encumber the player equipping the item

fields.name: agilityRequirement
fields.description: The agility stat requirement that must be met to equip this item

fields.name: dexterityRequirement
fields.description: The dexterity stat requirement that must be met to equip this item

fields.name: strengthRequirement
fields.description: The strength stat requirement that must be met to equip this item

fields.name: unitCount
fields.description: The stack count on this item.  For items which do not stack, this value will always be 1.

fields.name: maxRepairPoints
fields.description: The number of repair points this item was created at

fields.name: maxHealth
fields.description: The amount of health this item was created at and will be restored to each time it is repaired

fields.name: currentRepairPoints
fields.description: The current number of repair points remaining on this item. This value will be reduced when the item is repaired

fields.name: currentHealth
fields.description: The current health on this item. This value is reduced when the item is used or attacked.

fields.name: healthLossPerUse
fields.description: Factor used to decide how much health the item will lose each time it is used.

fields.name: maxItemCount
fields.description: The max item count that can be placed into a container, only used if the value is greater then 1.  Stacks of substances/blocks count as 1 item per stack.

fields.name: maxItemMass
fields.description: The max item mass of all contained items that can be placed into a container, only used if the value is greater then 1

fields.name: givenName
fields.description: Custom name given to item at crafting item

fields.name: stackHash
fields.description: Identifies items that are of the same type and have the same stats.

fields.name: voxItems
fields.description: items contained within the vox job of this item

fields.name: location
fields.description: details about the location of the item

fields.name: equipped
fields.description: Location filled if this item is equipped

fields.name: inContainer
fields.description: Location filled if this item is in a container

fields.name: inVox
fields.description: Location filled if this item is in a vox

fields.name: inventory
fields.description: Location filled if this item is in a player's inventory

fields.name: ground
fields.description: Location filled if this item in on the ground

fields.name: characterID
fields.description: The character the item is equipped on

fields.name: gearSlots
fields.description: The gear slots the item is equipped to

fields.name: containerInstanceID
fields.description: The item ID of the container this item is in

fields.name: position
fields.description: The UI position of the item

fields.name: voxInstanceID
fields.description: The item ID of the vox this item is contained in

fields.name: itemSlot
fields.description: The slot this item is associated with the recipe

fields.name: characterID
fields.description: The character that has this item in their inventory

fields.name: position
fields.description: The UI position of the item

fields.name: groupID
fields.description: The group id set for stacked ground items

fields.name: ingredientItem
fields.description: Required item template of the ingredient

fields.name: outputItem
fields.description: Item template for the item produced by this recipe

fields.name: ingredientItem
fields.description: Required item template of the ingredient

fields.name: outputItem
fields.description: Item template for the item produced by this recipe

fields.name: ingredient
fields.description: The item required by this part of the recipe

fields.name: requirementPath
fields.description: Extra requirements on the item, not used if the ingredient is provided.

fields.name: minPercent
fields.description: The minimum bounds for the percent of this ingredient is required.  Percent is calculated by: ingredientUnitCount/sumUnitCountOfAllIngredients

fields.name: maxPercent
fields.description: The maximum bounds for the percent of this ingredient is required.  Percent is calculated by: ingredientUnitCount/sumUnitCountOfAllIngredients

fields.name: minQuality
fields.description: The minimum quality the ingredient must be.  Value is 0-1

fields.name: maxQuality
fields.description: The maximum quality the ingredient must be.  Value is 0-1

fields.name: outputItem
fields.description: The template of the block item which will be produced by this recipe

fields.name: ingredients
fields.description: Ingredient rules for crafting the item

fields.name: ingredientItem
fields.description: Item template ID required for ingredient that will be refined

fields.name: outputItem
fields.description: The item template for the item produced by this recipe

fields.name: lossPercent
fields.description: What percentage of the substances added to the crafting job will be lost in the crafting process

fields.name: ingredients
fields.description: Input ingredients required for this recipe

fields.name: slot
fields.description: The name of the slot this ingredient will go in

fields.name: ingredientDef
fields.description: The specific ingredient required by this ingredient rule.  If this is empty, the recipe does not required a specific item.

fields.name: minQuality
fields.description: The minimum quality the ingredient must be.  Value is 0-1

fields.name: maxQuality
fields.description: The maximum quality the ingredient must be.  Value is 0-1

fields.name: unitCount
fields.description: How many of this item are required to create one copy of the output item

fields.name: voxState
fields.description: The result of searching for a nearby vox.

fields.name: jobType
fields.description: Which type of crafting job is currently being utilized

fields.name: jobState
fields.description: The current state the job is in.

fields.name: voxHealthCost
fields.description: How much damage the vox will take from performing this job.

fields.name: ingredients
fields.description: A list of all ingredients that are currently stored in the vox.  These are destroyed at the end of the job

fields.name: outputItems
fields.description: The list of all items which will be rewarded when the vox job is completed.  This information is only available is job is fully configured and ready to run

fields.name: totalCraftingTime
fields.description: How long the job will take to run.  This information is only available is job is fully configured and ready to run

fields.name: timeRemaining
fields.description: The total seconds remaining for this job to finish.  This information is only valid while the job is running.

fields.name: givenName
fields.description: The custom name for the item being produced. Only for Make jobs

fields.name: itemCount
fields.description: How many item to make. Only for Make jobs

fields.name: recipeID
fields.description: The ID of the recipe which will be performed.  This could be one of serveral types of recipes depending on the vox job type

fields.name: endQuality
fields.description: The player specified end quality for a substance. Only for Refine jobs

fields.name: usedRepairPoints
fields.description: How many repair points will be used when repairing the item. Only for Repair jobs

fields.name: startTime
fields.description: What time the job was started.  The job must be in the Running or Finished state for this information to be valid.

fields.name: grindRecipe
fields.description: The grind recipe details. Only for Grind jobs

fields.name: purifyRecipe
fields.description: The purify recipe details. Only for Purify jobs

fields.name: blockRecipe
fields.description: The block recipe details. Only for Block jobs

fields.name: refineRecipe
fields.description: The refine recipe details. Only for Refine jobs

fields.name: shapeRecipe
fields.description: The shape recipe details. Only for Shape jobs

fields.name: makeRecipe
fields.description: The make recipe details. Only for Make jobs

enumValues.name: NotOwnedByPlayer
enumValues.description: Vox found nearby but it is not owned by this player

enumValues.name: Configuring
enumValues.description: Vox job type has been selected.  Recipe is being picked and ingredients are being entered

enumValues.name: Running
enumValues.description: A valid recipe has been entered, ingredients are locked in place and the job is running

enumValues.name: Finished
enumValues.description: The recipe has ran sucessfully and is ready to be collected

fields.name: characterID
fields.description: The character that currently owns this item

fields.name: gearSlots
fields.description: the list of all the gear slots the item is in

fields.name: ammo
fields.description: If true, this item is some kind of ammunition

fields.name: ammoType
fields.description: The ammunition type of the weapon. Will be None if the item is not some kind of ammunition

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique identifier for this substance

fields.name: items
fields.description: List of items contained within this item.  This includes wrapped items, inventory, and equipment items

fields.name: myState
fields.description: The state of the trade, from your perspective

fields.name: myItems
fields.description: The items you've added to the trade

fields.name: theirEntityID
fields.description: The entity ID of who is being traded with

fields.name: theirState
fields.description: The state of the trade, from the perspective of the entity you are trading with

fields.name: theirItems
fields.description: The items you will get from this trade

enumValues.name: Invited
enumValues.description: An invite has been sent to another entity to start a trade

enumValues.name: ModifyingItems
enumValues.description: Trade session has been accepted, items can now be added to the trade session

enumValues.name: Locked
enumValues.description: Trade items have been marked as locked.  In this state, items may not be added or removed from the trade session.  The trade cannot move on to the confirmed state unless both parties are in the locked (or confirmed) state

enumValues.name: Confirmed
enumValues.description: Mark the trade as confirmed.  In this state, items may not be added or removed from the trade session.  When the second party has confirmed the trade, the items will be swapped.

fields.name: voxStatus
fields.description: The status of the nearest vox belonging to your player

fields.name: recipesMatchingIngredients
fields.description: ID's of recipes which match the current ingredient list in the vox

fields.name: possibleIngredients
fields.description: List of inventory items compatible with the current vox job

args.name: slot
args.description: The slot to get ingredients for. (required)

fields.name: possibleIngredientsWithSlots
fields.description: List of inventory items compatible with the current vox job

fields.name: possibleItemSlots
fields.description: List of sub item slots this vox job uses

fields.name: blockRecipes
fields.description: List of recipes for the Block vox job

fields.name: purifyRecipes
fields.description: List of recipes for the Purify vox job

fields.name: grindRecipes
fields.description: List of recipes for the Grind vox job

fields.name: refineRecipes
fields.description: List of recipes for the Refine vox job

fields.name: shapeRecipes
fields.description: List of recipes for the Shape vox job which have been discovered by the player.  Shape recipes are discovered when the right combination of materials are added to a vox during a shape job.

fields.name: makeRecipes
fields.description: List of recipes for the Make vox job

args.name: shard
args.description: Shard ID to request orders from. *REQUIRED*

args.name: filter
args.description: How many results should be skipped. (default: "")

args.name: count
args.description: How many results to query for at once. Max value is 50. (default: 25)

args.name: skip
args.description: How many results should be skipped. (default: 0)

args.name: includeDisbanded
args.description: Include disbanded orders in the results. (default: false)

args.name: sort
args.description: Key to sort by, valid options are: name, realm. (default: "")

fields.name: order
fields.description: Get an order by id and shard.

fields.name: myCharacter
fields.description: Get the character of the currently logged in user.

fields.name: character
fields.description: Get a character by id and shard.

fields.name: myEquippedItems
fields.description: retrieve all the session users equipped items

fields.name: myInventory
fields.description: Retrieve data about the character's inventory

fields.name: entityItems
fields.description: retrieve information about an item that is stored in an entity currently loaded on the server

fields.name: secureTrade
fields.description: Information about current secure item trade the player is engaged in.

fields.name: crafting
fields.description: Information about crafting recipes, nearby vox status, and potential interactions with the current vox job.

fields.name: totalCount
fields.description: The total count of objects matching the query

fields.name: created
fields.description: The datetime the Order was created.

fields.name: realm
fields.description: The realm to which the Order belongs.

fields.name: memberCount
fields.description: The number of members in the Order.

fields.name: formerMembers
fields.description: The former members of the Order.

fields.name: myMemberInfo
fields.description: Gets the current session users OrderMember info if they are a member of this order.

fields.name: shard
fields.description: The shard on which the Order exists.

fields.name: disbanded
fields.description: Whether or not this order was disbanded.

fields.name: disbandDate
fields.description: The date time of when this order was disbaned.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The character ID of the member.

fields.name: joined
fields.description: The date time of when the member joined the Order.

fields.name: parted
fields.description: The date time of when the character left the Order.

fields.name: rank
fields.description: The current rank of the member.

fields.name: extraPermissions
fields.description: Additional permissions assigned to this member.

fields.name: permissions
fields.description: All permissions assigned to this member, includes permissions from rank and extraPermissions.

fields.name: race
fields.description: The race of the Order member.

fields.name: gender
fields.description: The gender of the Order member.

fields.name: class
fields.description: The class of the Order member.

fields.name: lastLogin
fields.description: The last login date time for the Order member.

fields.name: kills
fields.description: Kill count of the Order member.

directives.name: include
directives.description: Directs the executor to include this field or fragment only when the 'if' argument is true.

directives.name: skip
directives.description: Directs the executor to skip this field or fragment when the 'if' argument is true.

directives.name: deprecated
directives.description: Marks an element of a GraphQL schema as no longer supported.

args.name: reason
args.description: Explains why this element was deprecated, usually also including a suggestion for how to access supported similar data. Formatted in [Markdown](https://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/).
